nodes.bodyText: if it's been extracted for being able to choose the outputStream easily in the test, maybe I would indicate it in a comment. Or is it going to be used and reused?
In fact, this was present in 10.10 but removed in 11 and now back for test yes. I'm not sure it needs a comment.
if it's a simple comment shouldn't it be one-lined?
I would say it is free. As I like to have room in the code for clarity, I converted it to javadoc.
but shouldn't it start with two stars to be considered Javadoc?
You can have a look at the code which reflects the change https://github.com/nuxeo/nuxeo/pull/4281/files#diff-c7467595cf49ff4ffa220ef476aa4384R178
